card-active-slds

Lightning Design System based Active Card. Shows fields in left column and actions in the right column. Overflow actions appear in the dropdown on the top right of the card.

Se modificó el template en la Linea 24 (data.limitActionLinksTo:3), paso a (data.limitActionLinksTo:4), para que permitiera mostrar la Acción "Convenios de Pago"
Name: Card-Active-ByOrderedFields
